body:
Comment 9: 
Yes, mine is an Ivy Bridge - E5-1620 v2 @ 3.70GHz

BenchmarkCopy	100000000	        22.0 ns/op
BenchmarkMyCopy	100000000	        19.9 ns/op
BenchmarkSimpleCopy	50000000	        34.2 ns/op
BenchmarkSimpleCopyB	50000000	        26.5 ns/op

The MOVSB instead of MOVSQ is faster, but not as fast as SSE.  And it still has a large
startup cost which makes it impractical for small sizes.
